r.s: Abstraction of various SASL mechanism responses
r.d: Provides code to generate responses to common SASL mechanisms, including: - Digest-MD5 - Cram-MD5 - Plain - Anonymous - Login (Pseudo mechanism) - SCRAM
r.n: QA release * Added basic support for any mechanism of the SCRAM family; with thanks to Jehan Pagès. [kguest] * crammd5 and digestmd5 mechanisms name deprecated in favour of IANA registered names 'cram-md5' and 'digest-md5'; with thanks to Jehan Pagès. [kguest]
